snippet: Hurricane Jova roared toward Mexico’s vulnerable Pacific Coast on Tuesday, leading to evacuations in the tourist area and shutting down the port in Manzanillo.
lead_paragraph: Hurricane Jova roared toward Mexico’s vulnerable Pacific Coast on Tuesday, leading to evacuations in the tourist area and shutting down the port in Manzanillo.

headline.main: Mexico: Hurricane Threatens Resorts on the Pacific Coast
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Hurricane Threatens Resorts on the Pacific Coast
